name: Notebook Adventure
description:
Have you ever looked at an empty piece of paper for minutes and imagined various stories or mini games? No? Is it just me...? Alright... I'm the type that spends 10 minutes creating a silly drawing and for the next few hours I'm trying to find a meaning to all my own non-sensical scribbles.

Yep, this idea is perfect to create a GBA game about, Especially when this is the only idea that floats around in your exhasted thoughts. 

How to play
  • Left/Right : move your character horizontally
  • Up/Down : move on stairs
  • A : jump
  • L : switch character
  • R : hold for explorer mode 
  • Start : pause menu
Credits

  • modarcihve.org for providing spectacular retro music-related resources
  • libgba for the GBA development tools
  • any GBA-related forum, article, post, source codes all over the internet, no matter I have read them or not. They are amazing and each one is a valuable source of answer for any of your possible questions.
